title: National Geographic Everest PC Game
description:
Everest - Great Strategy Game

Many dream of conquering Everest...Some succeed, but many don't make it back alive! Some people have always viewed the quest of Everest as a lifelong calling...are you one of them? Bone-chilling cold and horrid mountain conditions are just a few of the challenges Everest has in store for you. A rare blend of simulation and action-adventure. Everest will take you on a journey to the ULTIMATE GOAL!
-Strategy 
-Teamwork 
-Resource Management 
-SURVIVAL! 

Features:
-Climb 7 of the world's most feared summits 
-Falling rocks, jagged ice shards, avalanches, and a battery of other elements 
 await your arrival...death will stare you in the face 
-Continually shifting weather conditions...just like the real thing! 
-Choose your climbing team carefully as each player has specific strengths and 
 weaknesses 
-Purchase 1000s of gear combinations for your ascent to the top 

System Requirements for Windows
-Windows 98/ME/2000/XP 
-Pentium III 400Mhz 
-64 MB RAM 
-DirectX 8.1 
-500 MB hard drive space 
-4X CD-ROM 
-16 MB DirectX compatible graphics card 
-DirectX compatible sound card 
-Mouse 
-Keyboard
